block.tconstruct.brownstone.tooltip: You move a bit faster on it
block.tconstruct.casting.tooltip: Cast items using molten metals from a Smeltery
block.tconstruct.channel.tooltip: Filled with faucets to move liquids for casting
block.tconstruct.faucet.tooltip: Drains liquids from Smelteries and Tanks
block.tconstruct.metal.tooltip: Can be used as beacon base
block.tconstruct.seared_tooltip: Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.
block.tconstruct.seared_glass.tooltip:
Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.
Cannot store liquids.
block.tconstruct.seared_tank.tooltip:
Heart of the Smeltery
Retains liquid when broken.
block.tconstruct.slime_channel.tooltip: Flows like water, feels like gelatin
block.tconstruct.slime_dirt.tooltip: Slimy, but lets you jump higher
block.tconstruct.slime_grass.tooltip: So soft! Lets you jump higher
block.tconstruct.smeltery_io.drain.toolt: Fluid in- and output for the Smeltery and Tinker Tank
block.tconstruct.slimy_mud_green.tooltip: Slows, but lets you jump even higher
block.tconstruct.part_chest.tooltip: Can hold a large amount of toolparts
block.tconstruct.wood_rail_trapdoor.tool:
Minecarts with a Hopper can
insert into the block below
block.tconstruct.wooden_dropper_rail.too:
Minecarts with a Hopper can
insert into the block below
block.tconstruct.wooden_hopper.tooltip: Slower, cheaper variant of the hopper
config.synced.restart: Your configuration has been updated to match the server. Restart Minecraft.
death.attack.bleed.item: %1$s bled to death from %2$s attack with %3$s
death.attack.splinter: %s caught a splinter. Must've been massive
gui.error.already_has_extra_trait: The tool already has an embossment, it can only have one.
gui.error.craft_event.modifier.default: Modifying this tool with these items was prevented by another mod.
gui.error.craft_event.replace.default: Replacing this toolpart was prevented by another mod.
gui.error.craft_event.tool.default: Crafting of this item was prevented by another mod.
gui.error.craft_event.toolpart.default: Crafting of this toolpart was prevented by another mod.
gui.error.incompatible_enchantments: Modifier %s cannot be combined with enchantment %s
gui.error.incompatible_modifiers: Modifiers %s and %s cannot be applied together
gui.error.incompatible_trait: Modifier %s can not be used together with trait %s
gui.error.invalid_pattern: Pattern does not contain a valid tool part!
gui.error.not_enough_durability:
Not enough durability to replace parts!
%d more durability required.
gui.error.useless_tool_part:
This part can not be used to craft any tool!
Either the material %s is missing some information or no tool uses a(n) %s in its crafting.
gui.error.wrong_material_part: One or multiple items have an unsupported material for this tool.
gui.general.hover: Hover over the entries for more info
gui.jei.alloy.title: Alloying
gui.jei.casting.title: Casting
gui.jei.drying.title: Drying
gui.jei.smelting.title: Smelting
gui.part_builder.info:
Here you can craft tool parts to fulfill your tinkering fantasies.

To craft a part simply put its pattern into the left slot. The two remaining slots hold the material you want to craft your part out of.
gui.seared_furnace.progress.no_fuel: No valid fuel in seared furnace
gui.seared_furnace.progress.no_heat: Not enough heat to smelt this item
gui.seared_furnace.progress.no_space: Resulting stack is too large for the slot
gui.smeltery.fuel.invalid: §4%s is not a valid smeltery fuel!
gui.smeltery.progress.no_heat: Not enough heat to melt this item
gui.smeltery.progress.no_space: Not enough free space in the smeltery
gui.tool_station.info: The main way to repair or change your tools. Place a tool and a material on the left to get started.
item.tconstruct.arrow.desc: The Arrows are the ammo used for Tinkers' Bows. One stack provides many shots, and they can be modified as any tool.
item.tconstruct.battleaxe.desc:
The Battleaxe is a heavy offensive weapon, bringing the berserker out. It is capable of bringing down small trees and can send foes flying.
Right Click: Berserk
item.tconstruct.battlesign.desc:
The Battlesign is the ultimate defensive weapon. An advance in weapon technology worthy of Zombie Pigmen everywhere.
Can be used as a shield, reflects projectiles.
item.tconstruct.bolt.desc:
The Bolts are the ammo used for Tinkers' Crossbows. One stack provides many shots, and they can be modified as any tool.
Partially penetrates enemy armor.
item.tconstruct.book.tooltip:
The book every Tinker needs
by Skyla
item.tconstruct.broadsword.desc:
The Broadsword is a universal weapon. Sweep attacks keep enemy hordes at bay.
Also good against cobwebs!
item.tconstruct.cleaver.desc:
The Cleaver is a heavy offensive weapon. It has powerful strikes, but is difficult to wield.
Cleavers benefit from high damage.
Slow, requires two hands!
item.tconstruct.cold_spaghetti.tooltip:
Well, that's better, but they still taste gross.
Warming them up should make them edible.
They might even be good enough to get you off your weak knees.
item.tconstruct.crossbow.desc:
The Crossbow is a slow but very powerful weapon. It has to be loaded beforehand by holding rightclick, but can be fired at any moment afterwards.
Uses Tinkers' Bolts.
item.tconstruct.excavator.desc:
The Excavator is a broad digging tool. It digs up large areas of soil and snow in a wide range.
Terraforming!
item.tconstruct.frying_pan.desc:
The Frying Pan is a heavy weapon with knockback to create some distance. It also goes BOING!
Right Click: Heavy Blow
item.tconstruct.hammer.desc:
The Hammer is a broad mining tool. It harvests blocks in a wide range.
Also effective against undead.
item.tconstruct.hatchet.desc:
The Hatchet chops up wood and makes short work of leaves. It also makes for a passable weapon.
Chop chop!
item.tconstruct.ingots.knightslime.toolt: Slimy yet metallic but also stone? Fascinating!
item.tconstruct.kama.desc:
The Kama is a precision reaping tool, mowing down plants and shearing animals.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.knightslime_ingot.toolti: Slimy yet metallic but also stone? Fascinating!
item.tconstruct.longbow.desc:
The Longbow is a powerful long range weapon. It provides high damage but is less mobile than its short brother.
Uses Tinkers' Arrows.
item.tconstruct.longsword.desc:
The Longsword is an offensive weapon. It is often used for charging into battle at full speed.
Right Click: Lunge
item.tconstruct.lumberaxe.desc:
The Lumber Axe is a broad chopping tool. It can fell entire trees in one swoop or gather wood in a wide range.
Timber!
item.tconstruct.materials.moss.tooltip:
Right click a Bookshelf with this
to convert it into Mending Moss.
§oConsumes 10 Levels
item.tconstruct.materials.mud_brick.tool: Building blocks for small and big
item.tconstruct.mattock.desc:
The Cutter Mattock is a versatile farming tool. It is effective on wood, dirt, and plants. It also packs quite a punch.
Right Click: Hoe ground
item.tconstruct.moms_spaghetti.tooltip1:
§oI guess they're all right... but it's just not the same.
They definitely need some sauce, but it has to be red.
item.tconstruct.moms_spaghetti.tooltip2:
§oSomething is missing.. could use some meat. Mama always used ALL the meat.
I should get at least three different meat types.
item.tconstruct.moms_spaghetti.tooltip3: §oJust like mama used to make them.
item.tconstruct.moss.tooltip:
Right click a Bookshelf with this
to convert it into Mending Moss.
§oConsumes 10 Levels
item.tconstruct.mud_brick.tooltip: Building blocks for small and big
item.tconstruct.pickaxe.desc:
The Pickaxe is a precise mining tool. It is effective on stone and ores.
It breaks blocks, OK?
item.tconstruct.piggybackpack.tooltip: Right-click mobs to pick them up
item.tconstruct.rapier.desc:
The Rapier is a special weapon that relies on quick strikes to defeat foes.
Right Click: Backpedal
item.tconstruct.scythe.desc:
The Scythe is a broad reaping tool, mowing down plants and foes alike.
Has an AOE Attack.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.sharpening_kit.tooltip:
Combine with a flint
Upgrades your tool to the material's mining level.
item.tconstruct.shortbow.desc:
The Shortbow is a quick and nimble weapon. It allows for fast movements while shooting arrows at a rapid rate.
Uses Tinkers' Arrows.
item.tconstruct.shovel.desc:
The Shovel digs up dirt. It is effective on dirt, sand, gravel and snow.
Just don't dig your own grave!
item.tconstruct.shuriken.desc:
The Shuriken is a fast, short ranged throwing weapon. It has high quantities but low damage.
Can be thrown from the off-hand.
item.tconstruct.slime_sling.tooltip:
Charge up, aim low, get flinging!
Use Slime Boots if you value your life!
item.tconstruct.slimesling.tooltip:
Charge up, aim low, get flinging!
Use Slime Boots if you value your life!
item.tconstruct.soggy_spaghetti.tooltip:
Now they're all wet, even your spaghetti arms can bend them now.
Let's hang them up and get them dry.
item.tconstruct.spaghetti.cold.tooltip:
Well, that's better, but they still taste gross.
Warming them up should make them edible.
They might even be good enough to get you off your weak knees.
item.tconstruct.spaghetti.hard.tooltip:
Completely inedible like that.
They need to be softened up, even your sweaty palms aren't enough for that.
They should probably soak in some water for a while.
item.tconstruct.spaghetti.soggy.tooltip:
Now they're all wet, even your spaghetti arms can bend them now.
Let's hang them up and get them dry.
item.tconstruct.wooden_hopper.tooltip: Slower, cheaper variant of the hopper
message.mending_moss.not_enough_levels: Mending moss requires at least %s levels
modifier.alien.desc:
§oThe stats feel off...§r
..as if they're changing! Maybe time will tell?
modifier.aquadynamic.desc:
§oIt's getting wet in here!§r
The tool is unhindered by water and loves rainy evenings.
modifier.aridiculous.desc:
§oTurn up the heat!§r
The tool works better in hotter environments.
modifier.autosmelt.desc:
§oA furnace in tool form!§r
Harvested blocks get smelted.
modifier.beheading.desc:
§oOff with his head!§r
Each level adds a 10% chance to get the enemies head on kill.
modifier.blasting.desc:
§oKa-Boom!§r
You can break non-effective blocks like normal blocks, but they might get destroyed.
modifier.breakable.desc:
§oThis side up!§r
Projectiles have a 50% chance to break on impact.
modifier.cheap.desc:
§oMore bang for your buck!§r
Increases durability gained when repairing the tool.
modifier.cheapskate.desc:
§oCheeky!§r
Stone is bad. Your tool has less durability.
modifier.coldblooded.desc:
§oSavage!§r
Deal increased damage to targets at full health.
modifier.crude.desc:
§oArmor is for cowards!§r
Bonus damage against unarmored targets.
modifier.crumbling.desc:
§oCrumble rumble rumble§r
The tool breaks soft blocks that don't need a tool faster.
modifier.dense.desc:
§oHard...er.§r
Your tool lasts longer when it has less durability.
modifier.duritos.desc:
§oDoesn't taste as good as it sounds.§r
Your tool lasts longer ...most of the time.
modifier.ecological.desc:
§oGreen Power!§r
Renewable resources are so good, they regenerate by themselves!
modifier.emerald.desc:
§oFancy!§r
Increases durability depending on base stats!
modifier.enderference.desc:
§oAnti-Teleport!§r
Prevents Endermen from teleporting around for a short time.
modifier.endspeed.desc:
§oQuantum speed!§r
Projectiles instantly travel to their destination.
modifier.established.desc:
§oFree bonus XP!§r
You gain additional XP.
modifier.extra_trait.desc:
§oLike magic, but better!§r
Embossed with the power of %s, obtaining some of its traits.
modifier.fiery.desc:
§oSo hot right now!§r
Bonus fire damage, sets your enemies on fire.
modifier.fins.desc:
§oSomething's fishy...§r
Attaching fins to the projectiles makes them travel like normal underwater.
modifier.flammable.desc:
§oCan't have enough fire!§r
Blocking blocks fire damage and getting hit sets the attacker on fire.
modifier.fortify.desc:
§oHarder, better, faster, stronger!§r
Mining level increased to the same level as %s.
modifier.freezing.desc:
§oWinter is Coming§r
Successful hits slow your target more and more.
modifier.glowing.desc:
§oShine bright§r
Whenever it gets too dark your tool sacrifices a part of itself to light up your way.
modifier.harvest_height.desc:
§oExpand!§r
Increases the height of the area affected by your tool. The effect is tool specific.
modifier.harvest_width.desc:
§oExpand!§r
Increases the width of the area affected by your tool. The effect is tool specific.
modifier.haste.desc:
§oWeeeeeee!§r
The redstone impulse when using your tool motivates your tool to move even faster.
modifier.hellish.desc:
§oFrom down below!§r
Deal bonus damage to non-Nether mobs.
modifier.holy.desc:
§oRadiant!§r
Deal bonus damage to undead enemies.
modifier.hovering.desc:
§oFree like the wind§r
Projectiles move slower but don't mind gravity as much.
modifier.insatiable.desc:
§oDevour!§r
During combat you deal more and more damage but also consume more and more durability.
modifier.jagged.desc:
§oMoves like jagged!§r
Every point durability lost increases damage.
modifier.knockback.desc:
§oHomerun!§r
Teach things how to fly - the cool way.
modifier.lightweight.desc:
§oSwift like the wind!§r
Increases the overall speed of your tool when mining and attacking.
modifier.luck.desc:
§oShiny!§r
You're getting all the nice things. And a lot of them.
modifier.magnetic.desc:
§oHow do they work?!§r
Hitting things attracts nearby things?!
modifier.mending_moss.desc:
§oIt's alive!§r
Picked up XP is stored in the tool. It will slowly use up the XP to regenerate durability.
modifier.momentum.desc:
§oFaster, keep going!§r
Mining blocks increases your speed, as long as you keep going.
modifier.necrotic.desc:
§oI feel so Alive!!§r
Hitting enemies returns health to you depending on damage dealt.
modifier.petramor.desc:
§oSo much stone, must see it all!§r
Your tool loves stone, it literally wants to absorb it (for durability).
modifier.poisonous.desc:
§oNot exactly lead-free!§r
Poisons enemies on hit.
modifier.prickly.desc:
§oOuch!§r
Nobody is safe from those thorns, they always hurt.
modifier.reinforced.desc:
§oSo strong!§r
Each level adds a %s chance to not use durability.
modifier.sharp.desc:
§oCan even cut words!§r
Hitting an enemy leaves them bleeding for a short time.
modifier.sharpness.desc:
§oOuch!§r
So sharp, it hurts to look at it.
modifier.shocking.desc:
§oBzzzzzt!§r
Running around, breaking blocks or hitting things charges your tool. Hitting an enemy discharges it, dealing damage and providing a speed boost. Mining a block discharges it, giving a mining speed boost.
modifier.shulking.desc:
§oUp up and away!§r
Hitting foes causes them to float away.
modifier.silk_touch.desc:
§oSmooth as silk!§r
Mined blocks drop themselves instead of the usual items.
modifier.smite.desc:
§oFor Justice!§r
Deal massive damage to undead.
modifier.soul_bound.desc:
§oA merry couple!§r
You love your tool. Not even death can part you.
modifier.spaghetti_meat.desc:
§oAll the meat!§r
Increases the nourishment value
modifier.spaghetti_sauce.desc:
§oWith beets by mom§r
Increases the saturation
modifier.spiky.desc:
§o200% cooler with spikes!§r
Blocking and getting hurt deals damage to the attacker.
modifier.splintering.desc:
§oA souvenir for your enemies!§r
Hit them more to deal more damage.
modifier.splinters.desc:
§oOuch!§r
Be careful not to catch a splinter!
modifier.splitting.desc:
§oTwo for one!§r
The sudden acceleration of releasing an arrow might cause it to split into two.
modifier.squeaky.desc:
§oCute.§r
Your tool is so soft and squeaky it gained silktouch, but deals no damage.
modifier.stiff.desc:
§oUnmoving!§r
Blocking reduces the damage taken even more.
modifier.stone_bound.desc:
§oYour tool absolutely loves stone!§r
The tool mines faster as it wears out, but does less damage.
modifier.superheat.desc:
§oTurn up the heat!§r
Deal bonus damage to enemies on fire.
modifier.tasty.desc:
§oOm Nom Nom§r
Smells so good.. You'd rather eat your tool than starve.
modifier.unnatural.desc:
§oAbomination!§r
The tool mines faster the higher its mining level is above the required one.
modifier.webbed.desc:
§oYuck!§r
Entangle your foes in cobwebs, slowing them.
modifier.writable.desc:
§oIntellectual!§r
More words. More Modifiers. It's only logical!
stat.bow.damage.desc:
Bonus damage dealt on hit.
The force of the arrow.
stat.bow.drawspeed.desc: How fast you can draw the bow.
stat.bow.range.desc: How far the projectile can be propelled.
stat.bowstring.modifier.desc: Tool durability will be multiplied by this.
stat.extra.durability.desc: How much durability this part contributes when used as an accessory.
stat.fletching.accuracy.desc:
How stable the flight path will be using this fletching.
Affects the overall accuracy of the projectile.
stat.fletching.modifier.desc:
How many arrows you can craft with this.
Projectile ammo will be multiplied by this.
stat.handle.durability.desc:
How well the material can be held.
Tool durability will be changed by this amount.
stat.handle.modifier.desc:
How suitable the tool material is as a handle.
The total durability of the tool will be multiplied by this.
stat.head: Head
stat.head.attack.desc:
Base value for attack calculations.
The end result depends on the tool itself and the other components used.
stat.head.durability.desc:
The base-value for durability calculations.
Usually an integral part to the overall durability of a tool.
stat.head.harvest_level.desc: What range of blocks a tool with a tool head of this material can mine.
stat.head.mining_speed.desc:
How fast a tool with a tool head of this material can mine blocks.
May be influenced by other toolparts.
stat.shaft.ammo.desc:
How many arrows you can get out of it.
This much flat ammo will be added.
stat.shaft.modifier.desc:
Each arrow needs a suiting core. It determines how well it lasts.
The total ammo count of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tconstruct.smeltery_item_tooltip: Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.
tooltip.part.missing_stats:
Material is missing the required stats:
%s
